Subject: New poll for nbwrpg 
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit


Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

What would be the best option to save 
this RPG? 

  o More Players 
  o Add this RPG to more searching reasurces. 
  o More contests. 
  o Improve the Story line. 
  o Improve the currents rules 
  o More characters 
  o All above 
  o Do a meeting in order to get more ideas  (including above) 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
